about_the_game:
Monster Girl Descent is a Card-Based Roguelike Adult game featuring monster girls.

Game Story:
Travel into a dangerous and notorious cave filled with sexy monster girls. Fight them off or face the consequences, they're hungry for men!

The town of Mon lies next to a cave notorious for containing dangerous monster girls. For generations the monster girls have come out to kidnap the townsmen. Men that are kidnapped are usually used for the Monster Girls' sexual needs until they are of no further use.

Due to the constant Monster girl attacks, the town regularly sends heroes in to the cave to try to put a stop to the attacks and defeat the monster girls once and for all.

However, every hero so far has perished at the hands of the monster queen.

Will you reach the bottom of the dungeon and slay the monster queen?

Or will you perish like so many others before you and become a mere sex slave?

Gameplay:
The gameplay consists of card based roguelike gameplay with a JRPG twist.
During your adventure you will come across many types of monster girls and many different cards and abilities that can aid you in battle.
Be warned, if you lose you will be violated.

  • Varied H-Scenes with feisty monster girls
  • Card based Combat with many builds and abilities
  • 3D First Person Cave delving action!
  • A randomly generated cave with many secrets that changes every run
  • Upgrade your town to unlock more features and permanent upgrades for your next run into the dungeon!

    And much more to come!

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains 2D CG scenes depicting graphic sex scenes.

Gameplay depicts Female Monster Girl Characters attacking and dominating the male player character with sexual acts.

This game explores non-consensual sex themes as well as sexual scenes involving drug use. These themes are present in many scenes in the game from the start.

This game involves themes of sexual assault in the notion of females sexually assaulting the main male character.
The player will battle with "monster girls" that want to sexually assault them and participate in non-consensual sex.
All characters are over the age of 20.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 or better Display

name: Monster Girl Descent

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows® 8.1/10 (64bit) or Better
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 or better Display
